about_the_game:
A tileset with classical flair! If you need Greco-Roman style temples, towns and palaces, look no further – grab the Spirit of Greece tileset for RPG Maker!

The Spirit of Greece tileset includes:

Base tiles – water, grass, dirt, rubble, etc.
2 styles of marble
3 rugs
Greek border design
3 tables
Autotile fence
flowers
Fluffy grass overlay
and more!

Walls:

4 styles of wall, one of which has an inset space for decorating
Terra cotta roof tile (with matching shadow side)
Flat roofing tiles to match floors

Also included:

Country landscape tiles – set your town on a hill with included cliff tiles, and decorate with trees, brush, bushes, flowers and more.
Lots of roofing tiles to make it possible to make L-shaped roofs, angled roofs, etc.
Lots of pillars in multiple sizes. Includes arches made from the same pillars.
Also includes broken pieces; you can build ruins with this set as well.
Windows and insets in various sizes, lit and unlit versions.
Domes and other architectural pieces
Diagonal stairs
Small statues, male and female
Market setup. Includes pre-made booths in side view, and empty tiles so you can design your own. Includes lots of items – vegetables, meats, fish, baked goods, magical items, clothes and more!
Common items like barrels, firewood, sacks, etc.
Fireplaces
Seating and beds in a chaise lounge style
Small dressers and cabinets in front and side views
Tiny fence setup – smaller than the autotile fence; can be used for a more understated railing system
Cooking pots
Room accessories – shelving (with and without items), plants, fan, pots, etc
and more!


Events and Animations

4 styles of fire animation
2 water animations (with small variations; you can choose different ones so they don’t look exactly the same as they’re running.)
matching treasure chest
door animations with lit and unlit interiors


UPDATE January 2025:

* Treasure box animation fix, other minor fixes


Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
